title: Reaction pathways and energetics of the deconstruction of lignin carbohydrate complexes (LCCs) in lignocellulosic biomass
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00193A, Paper
Seth Beck, Samir H. Mushrif
The present work characterizes deconstruction pathways of LCC linkages and suggests that selective LCC cleavage is a thermodynamically controlled process.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
